comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Port Said, Egypt is the Mediterranean end of the Suez Canal and was a site of WWI activity in late 1915 and early 1916. For example, see NYT of Dec 19, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F70B1FFA3E5F1773...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the information on Port Said. We will add some more detail to this record.
